mapper.insert: insert into game(title, category, base, problem, description, hint, item_cnt, text) values(#{title}, #{category}, #{base}, #{problem}, #{description}, #{hint}, #{item_cnt}, #{text})
mapper.update: update game set title=#{title}, category=#{category}, base=#{base}, problem=#{problem}, description=#{description}, hint=#{hint}, item_cnt=#{item_cnt}, text=#{text} where id=#{id}
